CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 7, 1940, reads: "Notables Of Nation Discuss Defense Participation At Hampton Conference - Approximately 350 white and colored leaders gathered at Hampton institute last Monday and Tuesday for the inauguration of Hampton's sixth president, Dr. Malcolm MacLean, and to take part in Conference for the Participation of Negroes in National Defense. Defense activity was divided into 11 sections.  Some of those who made contributions to the discussions, caught by Staff Photographer Harris, are shown above....5. The procession before the inaugural and the opening of the conference..."
TitMainTitle: Man wearing graduation robe and mortar board, walking down street with crowd looking on, at Hampton Institute
